articles.description: It made sense to give Facundo Pellistri minutes because the second leg became a dead rubber after United’s 4-1 win over Real Betis last week and Antony was too ill to travel with the squad.
articles.content:

articles.description: Gujarat Giants defeated Delhi Capitals by 11 runs in their WPL 2023 match, at the Brabourne Stadium in Mumbai.
